summary.span: 定義 控制項中資料項目與其所繫結之節點之間的關聯性。

span.span: Defines the relationship between a data item and the node it is binding to in a control.

remarks.format:
## Remarks 當控制項繫結至資料來源，其中每個資料項目都包含多個欄位 （例如具有數個屬性的 XML 元素），節點會顯示所傳回的值`ToString`資料項目的 預設的方法。When the control is bound to a data source where each data item contains multiple fields (such as an XML element with several attributes), a node displays the value that is returned by the `ToString` method of the data item, by default. 在 XML 項目，該節點會顯示項目名稱，其中顯示基礎結構的樹狀目錄中，不過沒有非常有用。In the case of an XML element, the node displays the element name, which shows the underlying structure of the tree, but is not very useful otherwise. 您可以藉由指定樹狀節點繫結，節點的屬性繫結至特定欄位。You can bind the properties of a node to a specific field by specifying tree node bindings. A物件會定義每個資料項目及它所繫結的節點之間的關聯性。A object defines the relationship between each data item and the node that it is binding to. 控制存放區及其中的物件屬性及套用繫結至資料來源建立樹狀階層和資料來源階層之間的一對一關聯性。The control stores its objects in the property and applies the bindings to the data source to create a one-to-one relationship between the tree hierarchy and the data source hierarchy. 在資料來源中，每個資料項目控制項嘗試比對的資料項目物件以建立對應物件。For each data item in the data source, the control attempts to match the data item to a object in order to create the corresponding object. 建立時物件，您必須指定繫結準則。When creating a object, you must specify the criteria for binding. 準則表示當資料的項目應該繫結到節點。The criteria indicates when a data item should be bound to a node. 您可以指定或屬性或這兩個屬性。You can specify the or property, or both properties. 指定這兩者沒有輕微的效能改善。There is a slight performance gain by specifying both. 節點深度指定節點層級取得繫結。A node depth specifies the node level that gets bound. 例如，下列宣告繫結`Name`和`ID`的資料來源欄位和屬性，分別的深度為 0 的所有節點：For example, the following declaration binds the `Name` and `ID` fields of the data source to the and properties, respectively, of all nodes with a depth of 0: ``` ``` 資料成員基礎資料來源中，指定資料的項目類型，但可以代表不同的資訊，根據資料來源。A data member specifies the type of the data item in the underlying data source, but can represent different information depending on the data source. 每個資料來源中的項目階層式資料 (由介面) 會公開屬性，指定資料的項目類型。Each data item in a hierarchical data source (represented by a interface) exposes a property, which specifies the type of the data item. 例如，資料成員的 XML 項目會指定項目的名稱。For example, the data member for an XML element specifies the name of the element. 當資料來源包含多個資料項目類型時，資料成員會指定哪些資料的項目類型使用。When a data source contains multiple data item types, the data member specifies which data item type to use. 下列宣告繫結``的項目樹狀目錄中，不論在階層中的位置中的所有節點的控制項：The following declaration binds the `` elements of an control to all the nodes in the tree, regardless of the location in the hierarchy: ``` ``` 一旦建立繫結準則時，您就可以繫結的屬性值可繫結的物件。Once the binding criteria is established, you can then bind a property of a object that can be bound to a value. 您可以繫結至資料項目的欄位，或為靜態值。You can bind to a field of a data item or to a static value. 當繫結至靜態值，所有物件的物件套用共用相同的值。When bound to a static value, all objects to which the object is applied share the same value. > [!NOTE] > 您可以選擇性地覆寫中的繫結的屬性藉由直接在節點中設定對應的屬性物件。You can selectively override a bound property in a object by setting the corresponding property directly in the node. 下表列出的屬性類別可讓您將屬性繫結資料項目欄位的物件。The following table lists the properties of the class that allow you to bind a property of the object to a field of a data item. |屬性Property|描述Description| |--------------|-----------------| ||繫結至欄位屬性物件。The field to bind to the property of a object.| ||繫結至欄位屬性物件。The field to bind to the property of a object.| ||繫結至欄位屬性物件。The field to bind to the property of a object.| ||繫結至欄位屬性物件。The field to bind to the property of a object.| ||繫結至欄位屬性物件。The field to bind to the property of a object.| ||繫結至欄位屬性物件。The field to bind to the property of a object.| 下表列出的屬性類別可讓您將屬性繫結成靜態值的物件。The following table lists the properties of the class that allow you to bind a property of the object to a static value. |屬性Property|描述Description| |--------------|-----------------| ||要繫結的靜態值屬性物件。The static value to bind to the property of a object.| ||要繫結的靜態值屬性物件。The static value to bind to the property of a object.| ||要繫結的靜態值屬性物件。The static value to bind to the property of a object.| ||要繫結的靜態值屬性物件。The static value to bind to the property of a object.| ||要繫結的靜態值屬性物件。The static value to bind to the property of a object.| ||要繫結的靜態值屬性物件。The static value to bind to the property of a object.| ||要繫結的靜態值屬性物件。The static value to bind to the property of a object.| ||要繫結的靜態值屬性物件。The static value to bind to the property of a object.| ||要繫結的靜態值屬性物件。The static value to bind to the property of a object.| ||要繫結的靜態值屬性物件。The static value to bind to the property of a object.| 如果衝突的會定義物件，控制項適用於樹狀節點繫結，以下列順序的優先順序：If conflicting objects are defined, the control applies the tree node bindings in the following order of precedence: 1. 物件定義，並相符項目深度和資料成員。The object that defines and matches both a depth and a data member. 2. 物件，定義並比對資料成員。The object that defines and matches the data member only. 3. 物件，定義並符合只的深度。The object that defines and matches the depth only. 4. 深度和資料成員都不會定義的物件。The object that defines neither the depth nor the data member. （這種類型的樹狀節點繫結套用到所有的節點在樹狀目錄中）。(This type of tree node binding is applied to all nodes in the tree.) 5. 資料來源中沒有相符的物件。The object that does not have a match in the data source. 在此情況下，所傳回的值`ToString`資料項目的方法則繫結到和的節點屬性物件套用。In this case, the value that is returned by the `ToString` method of the data item is then bound to the and properties of the nodes to which the object is applied. 類別也可讓您設定藉由設定節點中顯示的文字格式屬性。The class also allows you to format the text that is displayed in a node by setting the property. ## Examples 下表顯示一些範例樹狀結構節點的繫結的宣告。The following table shows some example tree node binding declarations. |範例繫結Example binding|描述Description| |---------------------|-----------------| |``|將繫結和樹狀結構中的所有節點的屬性`Title`和`ID`分別欄位的資料來源。Binds the and properties of all nodes in the tree to the `Title` and `ID` fields of the data source, respectively. 所有節點都使用這個樹狀結構節點繫結的宣告，因為和未設定的屬性。All nodes use this tree node binding declaration because the and properties are not set.| |``|將繫結和樹狀結構中的所有節點的屬性`Title`和`ID`欄位`Book`資料項目中的資料來源，分別。Binds the and properties of all nodes in the tree to the `Title` and `ID` fields of the `Book` data item in the data source, respectively.| |``|將繫結和屬性的所有節點的樹狀結構中的 2 深度`Title`和`ID`資料欄位的項目中資料來源，分別。Binds the and properties of all nodes with a depth of 2 in the tree to the `Title` and `ID` fields of the data item in the data source, respectively.| |``|繫結和屬性的所有節點的樹狀結構中的 2 深度`Title`和`ID`欄位`Book`資料項目中的資料來源，分別。Binds the and properties of all nodes with a depth of 2 in the tree to the `Title` and `ID` fields of the `Book` data item in the data source, respectively. 也會將繫結成靜態值的節點屬性。Also binds the property of the nodes to a static value.| 本節包含三個程式碼範例。This section contains three code examples. 第一個程式碼範例示範如何使用以宣告方式來定義一個節點以及資料的項目之間的關聯性的物件。The first code example demonstrates how to use objects declaratively to define the relationship between a node and a data item. 第二個程式碼範例示範如何使用以程式設計方式來定義一個節點以及資料的項目之間的關聯性的物件。The second code example demonstrates how to use objects programmatically to define the relationship between a node and a data item. 第三個程式碼範例會提供 XML 資料的第一個和第二個程式碼範例。The third code example provides sample XML data for the first and second code examples. 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用以宣告方式來定義一個節點以及資料的項目之間的關聯性的物件。The following code example demonstrates how to use objects declaratively to define the relationship between a node and a data item. 針對此範例正常運作，您必須複製此程式碼範例中，為 Book.xml 檔案之後所提供的範例 XML 資料。For this example to work correctly, you must copy the sample XML Examples 本節包含兩個程式碼範例。This section contains two code examples. 第一個程式碼範例示範如何使用屬性來指定要繫結至節點的 XML 項目。The first code example demonstrates how to use the property to specify which XML element to bind to a node. 第二個程式碼範例會提供第一個程式碼範例中的範例 XML 資料。The second code example provides sample XML data for the first code example. 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用屬性來指定要繫結至節點的 XML 項目。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to specify which XML element to bind to a node. 讓此正常運作的程式碼範例，您必須複製此程式碼範例中，為 Book.xml 檔案之後所提供的範例 XML 資料。For this code example to work correctly, you must copy the sample XML data, provided after this code example, to a file named Book.xml. MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ FormatString { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定字串，指定套用 物件之節點文字的顯示格式。

span.span: Gets or sets the string that specifies the display format for the text of a node to which the object is applied.

value.span: 格式化字串，指定套用 物件之節點文字的顯示格式。

span.span: A formatting string that specifies the display format for the text of a node to which the object is applied.

value.span: 預設值是空字串 ("")，表示未設定 屬性。

span.span: The default is an empty string (""), which indicates that the property is not set.

remarks.format:
## Remarks 屬性用來提供自訂格式的節點的文字。The property is used to provide a custom format for a node's text. 資料格式字串由兩個部分組成，在表單中，以冒號分隔的 { `A` : `Bxx` }。The data format string consists of two parts, separated by a colon, in the form { `A` : `Bxx` }. 例如，格式化字串`{0:F2}`會顯示兩個小數位數定點數字。For example, the formatting string `{0:F2}` displays a fixed-point number with two decimal places. > [!NOTE] > 整個字串必須括在大括號來表示其為格式字串，而不是常值字串中。The entire string must be enclosed in braces to indicate that it is a format string and not a literal string. 大括號以外的任何文字會顯示為常值文字。Any text outside the braces is displayed as literal text. 冒號之前的值 (`A`一般範例中) 以零為起始的參數清單中，指定的參數索引。The value before the colon (`A` in the general example) specifies the parameter index in a zero-based list of parameters. > [!NOTE] > 因為每個節點中只有一個值，這個值可以設定只為 0。This value can be set only to 0 because there is only one value in each node. 冒號後面的字元 (`B`一般範例中) 指定值的顯示格式。The character after the colon (`B` in the general example) specifies the display format for the value. 下表列出常見的格式。The following table lists the common formats. |格式字元Format character|顯示數值的值Displays numeric values in| |----------------------|--------------------------------| |`C`|貨幣格式。Currency format.| |`D`|十進位格式。Decimal format.| |`E`|科學記號 （指數） 格式。Scientific (exponential) format.| |`F`|固定的格式。Fixed format.| remarks.format: ## Remarks 當控制項所繫結至資料來源，請使用屬性來指定要繫結的自訂映像屬性物件。When the control is bound to a data source, use the property to specify a custom image to bind to the property of a object. 此繫結的關聯性會影響所有物件的物件套用。This binding relationship affects all objects to which the object is applied. 影像會顯示節點旁邊，只要用戶端瀏覽器支援的格式可以是任何檔案格式 （.jpg、.gif、.bmp 等等）。The image is displayed next to a node and can be in any file format (.jpg, .gif, .bmp, and so on), as long as the client browser supports that format. > [!NOTE] > 您可以藉由設定覆寫個別節點的映像及其直接屬性。You can override the image for an individual node by setting its property directly. 除了使用這個屬性，將相同的映像繫結至每個節點，您可以繫結屬性藉由設定資料來源的欄位物件屬性。Instead of using this property to bind the same image to each node, you can bind the property of a object to a field of a data source by setting the property. 顯示與節點旁邊的映像時屬性，您應考慮設定屬性。When displaying an image next to a node with the property, you should also consider setting the property. 您指定的工具提示文字會提供可用來將控制項設為更容易存取的映像的描述的輔助技術裝置。The ToolTip text that you specify provides Assistive Technology devices with a description of the image that can be used to make the control more accessible. 這個屬性的值會儲存檢視狀態中。The value of this property is stored in view state. ## Examples 本節包含兩個程式碼範例。This section contains two code examples. 第一個程式碼範例示範如何使用屬性，將套用物件的特定節點的深度。The first code example demonstrates how to use the property to apply a object at a specific node depth. 第二個程式碼範例會提供第一個程式碼範例中的範例 XML 資料。The second code example provides sample XML data for the first code example. 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用屬性來指定讓節點的自訂映像物件套用。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to specify a custom image for a node to which the object is applied. 針對此範例正常運作，您必須複製此程式碼範例中，為 Booklist.xml 檔案之後所提供的範例 XML 資料。For this example to work correctly, you must copy the sample XML data, provided after this code example, to a file named Booklist.xml. remarks.format: ## Remarks 當控制項所繫結至資料來源，請使用屬性來指定欄位名稱，即可將繫結至屬性物件。When the control is bound to a data source, use the property to specify the field name to bind to the property of a object. 此繫結的關聯性會影響所有物件的物件套用。This binding relationship affects all objects to which the object is applied. 當設定屬性，則控制項會顯示節點，而不是純文字的文字的超連結。When the property is set, the control displays a hyperlink for the text of the node, instead of plain text. 您也可以選擇性地設定屬性，以指定的視窗或框架，在其中顯示連結的內容。You can also optionally set the property to specify the window or frame in which to display the linked content. > [!NOTE] > 您可以選擇性地覆寫藉由設定屬性直接每個節點的屬性。You can selectively override the property by setting the property of each node directly. 而不是使用要繫結屬性屬性物件欄位中，您可以設定屬性設定為固定值屬性。Instead of using the property to bind the property of a object to a field, you can set the property to a fixed value by setting the property. > [!NOTE] > 如果資料來源包含多個欄位，您必須先設定或屬性或這兩個屬性，才能繫結至適當的欄位。If the data source contains multiple fields, you must first set the or property, or both properties in order to bind to the appropriate field. 這個屬性的值會儲存檢視狀態中。The value of this property is stored in view state. ## Examples 本節包含兩個程式碼範例。This section contains two code examples. 第一個程式碼範例示範如何使用屬性來指定屬性要繫結的 XML 項目是屬性物件物件套用。The first code example demonstrates how to use the property to specify which attribute of an XML element to bind to the property of a object to which the object is applied. 第二個程式碼範例會提供第一個程式碼範例中的範例 XML 資料。The second code example provides sample XML data for the first code example. 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用屬性來指定屬性要繫結的 XML 項目是屬性物件物件套用。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to specify which attribute of an XML element to bind to the property of a object to which the object is applied. 針對此範例正常運作，您必須複製此程式碼範例中，為 Booklist.xml 檔案之後所提供的範例 XML 資料。For this example to work correctly, you must copy the sample XML data, provided after this code example, to a file named Booklist.xml. remarks.format:
## Remarks 某些情況下，它並不實用靜態地預先定義的資料大小，或根據使用者輸入的自訂內容的樹狀結構。Sometimes, it is not practical to statically predefine the tree structure due to data size or custom content that depends on user input. 因為這個緣故，控制項支援動態節點母體擴展。Because of this, the control supports dynamic node population. 當屬性設定為`true`，節點的子節點，物件套用至取得在執行階段時展開節點填入。When the property is set to `true`, the child nodes of the node that the object is applied to gets populated at run time when the node is expanded. 資料繫結所設定的建立時的控制權傳輸至`true`，繫結所建立的屬性設定為`true`。When data bindings are created by setting the of the control to `true`, the bindings that are created have the property set to `true`. 以宣告方式建立的資料繫結具有屬性設定為`false`。Data bindings that are created declaratively have the property set to `false`. 使用宣告式語法可讓您控制個別的資料繫結的行為。Using the declarative syntax allows you to control the behavior of individual data bindings. > [!NOTE] > 不同於屬性類別屬性不需要定義的事件處理方法事件，如果您使用資料來源控制項，例如。Unlike the property of the class, the property does not require an event-handling method to be defined for the event, if you are using a data source control, such as . 相反地，控制項動態產生的事件處理方法，使用的屬性中的物件集合。Instead, the control dynamically generates an event-handling method using the properties of the objects in the collection. 您仍然可以定義的事件處理方法事件; 不過，它會呼叫之後的事件處理方法控制項。You can still define an event-handling method for the event; however, it will be called after the event-handling method for the control. 支援的瀏覽器也可以利用用戶端節點母體擴展。Supported browsers can also take advantage of client-side node population. 啟用時，這可讓控制項來擴展以動態方式在用戶端上的節點展開該節點時，這樣就不需要回傳至伺服器。When enabled, this allows the control to populate a node dynamically on the client when that node is expanded, preventing the need to post back to the server. 如需有關用戶端節點母體擴展的詳細資訊，請參閱。For more information on client-side node population, see . 這個屬性的值會儲存檢視狀態中。The value of this property is stored in view state. ## Examples 本節包含兩個程式碼範例。This section contains two code examples. 第一個程式碼範例示範如何使用屬性，以指定的節點是否顯示核取方塊。The first code example demonstrates how to use the property to specify whether a check box is displayed for a node. 第二個程式碼範例會提供第一個程式碼範例中的範例 XML 資料。The second code example provides sample XML data for the first code example. 下列範例示範如何使用屬性，以指定的節點是否顯示核取方塊。The following example demonstrates how to use the property to specify whether a check box is displayed for a node. 針對此範例正常運作，您必須複製此程式碼範例中，為 Book.xml 檔案之後所提供的範例 XML 資料。For this example to work correctly, you must copy the sample XML data, provided after this code example, to a file named Book.xml. [!code-aspx-csharp[TreeNodeBindingPopulateOnDemand#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/TreeNodeBindingPopulateOnDemand/CS/treenodebindingpopulateondemandcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[TreeNodeBindingPopulateOnDemand#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/TreeNodeBindingPopulateOnDemand/VB/treenodebindingpopulateondemandvb.aspx#1)] 下列程式碼範例會提供 XML 資料，上述程式碼範例。The following code example provides sample XML data for the preceding code example. ```

## Remarks 當控制項所繫結至資料來源，請使用屬性來指定要繫結至值屬性物件。When the control is bound to a data source, use the property to specify the value to bind to the property of a object. 此繫結的關聯性會影響所有物件的物件套用。This binding relationship affects all objects to which the object is applied. 屬性用來指定選取的節點時引發的事件。The property is used to specify which event or events are raised when a node is selected. > [!NOTE] > 您可以選擇性地覆寫藉由設定屬性直接每個節點的屬性。You can selectively override the property by setting the property of each node directly. 下表列出可用的選項。The following table lists the available options. |`SelectAction` 值`SelectAction` value|描述Description| |--------------------------|-----------------| |`TreeNodeSelectAction.Expand`|切換展開或摺疊節點。Toggles the node between expanded and collapsed. 引發事件或事件，視需要。Raises the event or the event, as appropriate.| |`TreeNodeSelectAction.None`|選取節點時，不引發任何事件。Raises no events when a node is selected.| |`TreeNodeSelectAction.Select`|選取節點時，引發 事件。Raises the event when a node is selected.| |`TreeNodeSelectAction.SelectExpand`|選取節點時，引發 和 事件。Raises both the and events when a node is selected. 只會展開節點，而不會摺疊。Nodes are only expanded, never collapsed.| > [!NOTE] > 的節點不會呈現其屬性設定為`TreeNodeSelectAction.None`。The is not rendered for a node with its property set to `TreeNodeSelectAction.None`. 這個屬性的值會儲存檢視狀態中。The value of this property is stored in view state. ## Examples 本節包含兩個程式碼範例。This section contains two code examples. 第一個程式碼範例示範如何使用屬性來指定在按下一個節點時，會引發的事件。The first code example demonstrates how to use the property to specify which event is raised when a node is clicked. 第二個程式碼範例會提供第一個程式碼範例中的範例 XML 資料。The second code example provides sample XML data for the first code example. 下列範例示範如何使用屬性來指定在按下一個節點時，會引發的事件。The following example demonstrates how to use the property to specify which event is raised when a node is clicked. 針對此範例正常運作，您必須複製此程式碼範例中，為 Book.xml 檔案之後所提供的範例 XML 資料。For this example to work correctly, you must copy the sample XML data, provided after this code example, to a file named Book.xml. ## Remarks 延展的多重節點選取項目中提供支援控制項，您可以在節點中顯示映像旁的核取方塊。To provide multinode selection support in the control, you can display check boxes next to an image in the node. 當控制項所繫結至資料來源，請使用屬性來指定要繫結至值屬性物件。When the control is bound to a data source, use the property to specify the value to bind to the property of a object. 此繫結的關聯性會影響所有物件的物件套用。This binding relationship affects all objects to which the object is applied. 屬性用來顯示或隱藏節點的核取方塊。The property is used to show or hide the check box for a node. > [!NOTE] > 雖然屬性可以用來顯示核取方塊，就更常使用屬性控制項。Although the property can be used to display check boxes, it is more common to use the property of the control. 不過，屬性會影響屬性; 指定的每個節點型別因此屬性通常用來覆寫該設定，讓節點物件套用。However, the property affects every node type that is specified by the property; therefore, the property is often used to override that setting for a node to which the object is applied. 您可以選擇性地覆寫藉由設定屬性直接每個節點的屬性。You can selectively override the property by setting the property of each node directly. 這個屬性的值會儲存檢視狀態中。The value of this property is stored in view state. ## Examples 本節包含兩個程式碼範例。This section contains two code examples. 第一個程式碼範例示範如何使用屬性，以指定的節點是否顯示核取方塊。The first code example demonstrates how to use the property to specify whether a check box is displayed for a node. 第二個程式碼範例會提供第一個程式碼範例中的範例 XML 資料。The second code example provides sample XML data for the first code example. 下列範例示範如何使用屬性，以指定的節點是否顯示核取方塊。The following example demonstrates how to use the property to specify whether a check box is displayed for a node. 針對此範例正常運作，您必須複製此程式碼範例中，為 Book.xml 檔案之後所提供的範例 XML 資料。For this example to work correctly, you must copy the sample XML data, provided after this code example, to a file named Book.xml. remarks.format:
## Remarks 當控制項所繫結至資料來源，請使用屬性來指定要繫結至值屬性物件。When the control is bound to a data source, use the property to specify the value to bind to the property of a object. 此繫結的關聯性會影響所有物件的物件套用。This binding relationship affects all objects to which the object is applied. 屬性用來指定視窗或框架中顯示 Web 內容的連結節點時，按一下該節點。The property is used to specify the window or frame in which to display the Web content that is linked to a node when that node is clicked. > [!NOTE] > 設定屬性覆寫屬性節點的控制項物件套用。Setting the property overrides the property of the control for the nodes to which the object is applied. 您可以選擇性地覆寫藉由設定屬性直接每個節點的屬性。You can selectively override the property by setting the property of each node directly. > [!NOTE] > 屬性轉譯成`target`屬性。The property renders as a `target` attribute. `target`屬性`anchor`XHTML 1.1 文件類型定義中不允許項目。The `target` attribute on `anchor` elements is not allowed in the XHTML 1.1 document type definition. 請勿設定屬性，如果轉譯的輸出為控制項必須符合 XHTML 1.1。Do not set the property, if the rendered output for the control must be XHTML 1.1 compliant. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[XHTML 標準，在 Visual Studio 和 ASP.NET](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/1b78d416-66bb-43a5-ac77-c703aab55b97)。For more information, see [XHTML Standards in Visual Studio and ASP.NET](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/1b78d416-66bb-43a5-ac77-c703aab55b97). > > 在建立可存取網頁時，您應該避免使用指向另一個視窗中的屬性。When creating accessible Web pages, you should avoid using the property to target another window. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[NIB: ASP.NET 網頁可及性](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/9b5f3e05-e88d-4248-a5f4-9e64850fa0ae)。For more information, see [NIB: ASP.NET Accessibility](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/9b5f3e05-e88d-4248-a5f4-9e64850fa0ae). 這個屬性的值會儲存檢視狀態中。The value of this property is stored in view state. ## Examples 本節包含兩個程式碼範例。This section contains two code examples. 第一個程式碼範例示範如何使用屬性來指定應該顯示在新視窗中該根節點相關聯的網頁。The first code example demonstrates how to use the property to specify that the Web page that is associated with the root node should be displayed in a new window. 第二個程式碼範例會提供第一個程式碼範例中的範例 XML 資料。The second code example provides sample XML data for the first code example. 下列範例示範如何使用屬性來指定應該顯示在新視窗中該根節點相關聯的網頁。The following example demonstrates how to use the property to specify that the Web page that is associated with the root node should be displayed in a new window. 針對此範例正常運作，您必須複製此程式碼範例中，為 Book.xml 檔案之後所提供的範例 XML 資料。For this example to work correctly, you must copy the sample XML data, provided after this code example, to a file named Book.xml. remarks.format: ## Remarks 當控制項所繫結至資料來源，請使用屬性來指定要繫結至值屬性物件。When the control is bound to a data source, use the property to specify the value to bind to the property of a object. 此繫結的關聯性會影響所有物件的物件套用。This binding relationship affects all objects to which the object is applied. 屬性用來補充屬性所儲存的節點相關聯的任何其他資料物件套用。The property is used to supplement the property by storing any additional data associated with the node to which the object is applied. 此值不會顯示在控制項中，通常用來儲存資料處理回傳事件。This value is not displayed in the control and is commonly used to store data for handling postback events. > [!NOTE] > 您可以選擇性地覆寫藉由設定屬性直接每個節點的屬性。You can selectively override the property by setting the property of each node directly. 而不是使用屬性，以將相同的值繫結至每個節點，您可以繫結屬性藉由設定資料來源的欄位物件屬性。Instead of using the property to bind the same value to each node, you can bind the property of a object to a field of a data source by setting the property. 這個屬性的值會儲存檢視狀態中。The value of this property is stored in view state. 這個屬性的值設定時，可以自動儲存到資源檔使用設計工具。The value of this property, when set, can be saved automatically to a resource file by using a designer tool. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱和[全球化和當地語系化](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8ef3838e-9d05-4236-9dd0-ceecff9df80d)。For more information, see and [Globalization and Localization](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8ef3838e-9d05-4236-9dd0-ceecff9df80d). ## Examples 本節包含兩個程式碼範例。This section contains two code examples. 第一個程式碼範例示範如何使用屬性來儲存相關節點的補充資料物件套用。The first code example demonstrates how to use the property to store supplemental data about a node to which the object is applied. 第二個程式碼範例會提供第一個程式碼範例中的範例 XML 資料。The second code example provides sample XML data for the first code example. 下列範例示範如何使用屬性來儲存相關節點的補充資料物件套用。The following example demonstrates how to use the property to store supplemental data about a node to which the object is applied. 針對此範例正常運作，您必須複製此程式碼範例中，為 Booklist.xml 檔案之後所提供的範例 XML 資料。For this example to work correctly, you must copy the sample XML data, provided after this code example, to a file named Booklist.xml. remarks.format: ## Remarks 當控制項所繫結至資料來源，請使用屬性來指定欄位名稱，即可將繫結至屬性物件。When the control is bound to a data source, use the property to specify the field name to bind to the property of a object. 此繫結的關聯性會影響所有物件的物件套用。This binding relationship affects all objects to which the object is applied. 屬性用來補充屬性所儲存的節點相關聯的任何其他資料物件套用。The property is used to supplement the property by storing any additional data associated with the node to which the object is applied. 此值不會顯示在控制項中，通常用來儲存資料處理回傳事件。This value is not displayed in the control and is commonly used to store data for handling postback events. > [!NOTE] > 您可以選擇性地覆寫藉由設定屬性直接每個節點的屬性。You can selectively override the property by setting the property of each node directly. 而不是使用要繫結屬性屬性物件欄位中，您可以設定屬性設定為固定值屬性。Instead of using the property to bind the property of a object to an field, you can set the property to a fixed value by setting the property. > [!NOTE] > 如果資料來源包含多個欄位，您必須先設定或屬性或這兩個屬性，才能繫結至適當的欄位。If the data source contains multiple fields, you must first set the or property, or both properties in order to bind to the appropriate field. 這個屬性的值會儲存檢視狀態中。The value of this property is stored in view state. ## Examples 本節包含兩個程式碼範例。This section contains two code examples. 第一個程式碼範例示範如何使用屬性來指定屬性要繫結的 XML 項目是屬性物件物件套用。The first code example demonstrates how to use the property to specify which attribute of an XML element to bind to the property of a object to which the object is applied. 第二個程式碼範例會提供第一個程式碼範例中的範例 XML 資料。The second code example provides sample XML data for the first code example. 下列範例示範如何使用屬性來指定屬性要繫結的 XML 項目是屬性物件物件套用。The following example demonstrates how to use the property to specify which attribute of an XML element to bind to the property of a object to which the object is applied. 針對此範例正常運作，您必須複製此程式碼範例中，為 Booklist.xml 檔案之後所提供的範例 XML 資料。For this example to work correctly, you must copy the sample XML data, provided after this code example, to a file named Booklist.xml.
